name: Comments Extra Fields For Post,Pages and CPT
author: N-Media

sections.description:
This plugin allow admin to add custom fields in comment area. These fields are saved as comment meta and is displayed under comment text. Four fields types are supported.

Live Demo

Create Fields

Features

  1. Drag and Drop fields
  2. Text,Radio, Radio and Select inputs
  3. Attach unlimited comments fields
  4. Compatible with all themes

Pro Features – 16 Input Types

  • Pro Inputs
    • Email
    • Date
    • Timezone
    • File Input
    • Image Picker
    • Color Picker
    • Color Palttes
    • Hidden Input
    • Dividers 4 styles
    • HTML Content
  • Disable extra field on frontend via setting. Only admin can see in comment admin.
  • Max file upload limit set
  • Custom Post Types Support
  • View & Edit Comments Admin

Buy PRO Version
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can set options from Comment Fields menu
sections.faq:
Where all fields are saved?

  • All fields are saved as Comment Meta

Can extra fields can be hidden for Frontend?

  • Yes, in PRO version. Admin can disable frontend extra fields.
